Entries.HMK_HaveBabyQuestion: Wouldn't it be amazing if we somehow had a child, @...?

Entries.HMK_HaveBabyQuestion_2: Wouldn't it be amazing if we somehow had yet another child, @...?

Entries.HMK_NewChild_5: Skrell seems pretty concerned about the amount of kids we have... but look at all of them! they're just so precious.
